pullrequest.title: Configure distributed sim from command line

content.raw:
I believe you can run distributed simulation using docker by running:

## Terminal 1

IGN_PARTITION=foo ./docker/run.bash ign-gazebo:nightly ign-gazebo-server -v 4  --network-role=primary --network-secondaries=1 -r

## Terminal 2

IGN_PARTITION=foo ./docker/run.bash ign-gazebo:nightly ign-gazebo-server -v 4 --network-role=secondary

## Terminal 3

IGN_PARTITION=foo ign topic -e -t /world/default/stats
